text: The Falkland Islands and Dependencies Aerial Survey Expedition (FIDASE) was a survey of the Falkland Islands and the Antarctic Peninsula which took place in 1955–56 and 1956–57. The survey was carried out by Hunting Aerosurveys Ltd.Wings Over Ice: The Falkland Islands and Dependencies Aerial Survey Expedition The expedition was based at Deception Island. == References ==
title: Falkland Islands and Dependencies Aerial Survey Expedition
